name: Astroshot (Heimsel)
description:
Long before our time, when strange creatures gathered around the center of the universe, one mighty spacetraveler changed the tides of history forever. Planets were created , life formed and societies flurished. But none of that should ever be known to you, oh brave hero. For you only witnessed the destructive nature of the ever growing black hole and all primitive life, that was devoured by it. Will you survive?

Drift and Shoot yourself as far into the outer rings of the galaxy and compete for the high score.

Far areas of the universe hold strong opponents, but provide more XP and Scorepoints.

This was made for the Score Space Jam #24. With leaderboards powered by LootLocker. Everything else was done by me. And I hope you have some fun with it :)
